todo sobre tor.description: Un conjunto completo de diapositivas para los entrenamientos de Tor

que-no-quede-huella.author: Tormenta

onion-browser-tutorial.author: Guardian Project
onion-browser-tutorial.description: This resource explains the features and how to use Onion Browser. Onion Browser is the only browser for iOS recommended by the Tor Project.

getting-your-hands-started-with-tails.name: Getting your hands started with Tails
getting-your-hands-started-with-tails.author: geb
getting-your-hands-started-with-tails.description: Step by step tutorial used to introduce Tails to journalism students. Actually used in journalism schools in France. Topics: Tor, persistence, metadata, secure removal, Veracrypt, OnionShare etc. On request ; please click to contact author.

ebook-defend-dissent.name: Defend Dissent: Digital Suppression and Cryptographic Defense of Social Movements
ebook-defend-dissent.author: Glencora Borradaile
ebook-defend-dissent.description: An introduction book to cryptography, Tor, and surveillance used against social movements in US.

leak-onion-soup.author: Exposing the invisible (Tactical Tech)
leak-onion-soup.description: A guide about using Tor to read, verify and process leaked data, which might come with a risk.

tails-tu-computadora-segura-en-cualquier.description: Tails training slides to human rights defenders, journalists and activists in Latin America.

orbot-tor-vpn-para-ios-android.description: Orbot training slides that cover how Tor works, how to bypass the censorship using bridges, and what are pluggable transports.

onion-browser-para-ios.description: Onion Browser training slides. This material covers how Tor works, bypassing censorship using bridges and pluggable transports.
